liability_cap: Not specified in provided excerpts (Article VII / Section 7.01 referenced but cap amount/standard not shown).
risk_explanation: This appears to be an intellectual property agreement with broad, perpetual, fully paid-up license grants and confidentiality obligations, which can create long-lived operational and compliance commitments. The governing law and exclusive Delaware jurisdiction may increase enforcement and dispute costs for a small SaaS vendor. The limitation of liability terms are referenced but not visible in the excerpts, creating uncertainty around financial exposure.
